title: Citrus-Sesame Dressing
description: Bright and fresh dressing that pops with arugula - sweet citrus + sesame keeps the salad light but bold
ingredients: Juice of ½ lemon (≈ 1 ½ tbsp bottled)
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a jar or bowl
Shake vigorously until emulsified (or whisk well)
Taste and adjust seasonings as needed
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days
notes: This dressing is perfect with arugula and other bitter greens. The combination of sweet citrus and nutty sesame creates a balanced, light but bold flavor. Shake well before each use as the oil may separate.
